2: naming early jet engines after rivers

--------------------
Text: Rolls-Royce Welland:  The name Welland is taken from the River Welland, in keeping with the Rolls-Royce policy of naming early jet engines after rivers based on the idea of continuous flow, air through the engine and water in a river.
